name: Absorbent Substrate
description: This sticky compound excels at absorbing other chemicals.

name: Access Tek Cave (Alpha)
description: Access the Tek Case with this.

name: Access Tek Cave (Beta)
description: Access the Tek Case with this.

name: Access Tek Cave (Gamma)
description: Access the Tek Case with this.

name: Advanced Bullet
description: A small-caliber modern bullet, primarily used with fabricated handguns.

name: Advanced Rifle Bullet
description: Primarily used with fabricated rifles.

name: Advanced Sniper Bullet
description: A high-caliber modern bullet, primarily used with fabricated sniper rifles

name: Air Conditioner
description: Requires electricity to run. Provides insulation from both the heat and the cold to an area.

name: Allosaurus Saddle
description: Equip an Allosaurus with this to ride it.

name: Ankylo Saddle
description: Equip an Ankylo with this to ride it.

name: Araneo Saddle
description: Equip an Araneo with this to ride it.

name: Argentavis Saddle
description: Equip an Argentavis with this to ride it.

name: Arthropluera Saddle
description: Equip an Arthropluera with this to ride it.

name: Assault Rifle
description: The fastest way to fill a target with holes.

name: Auto Turret
description: Requires electricity to run. Consumes bullets while firing. Can be configured to automatically attack hostiles within range.

name: Ballista Turret
description: Survivors can mount this and fire devastating ballista arrows, useful for bringing down large dinos and structures!

name: Baryonyx Saddle
description: Equip a Baryonyx with this to ride it.

name: Basic Kibble
description: This pet food recipe has been carefully designed to give balanced nutrition to many smaller creatures. Includes plant fibers to help with digestion and egg to bind the mix. Humans have difficulty digesting this.

composites.name: Cooked Meat, Cooked Fish Meat, or Cooked Meat Jerky

name: Basilosaurus Saddle
description: Equip a Basilosaurus with this to ride it.

name: Battle Tartare
description: Only eat this dish when you intend to go into a brawl. It causes pain and stress to your body, but grants you almost supernatural strength, speed, and resilience. Warning: This concoction can be habit forming.

name: Bear Trap
description: Immobilizes humans and small creatures.

name: Beelzebufo Saddle
description: Equip a Beelzebufo with this to ride it.

name: Beer Barrel
description: Ferments tasty brew from Thatch, Water, and Berries

name: Beer Jar
description: Mmmmm.

name: Beer Liquid
description: Put it in a glass jar to drink it!

name: Behemoth Gate
description: A large metal-plated concrete gate that can be used with a Behemoth Gateway to allow even the largest of creatures in or out.

name: Behemoth Gateway
description: A large metal-plated concrete gateway, reinforced with obsidian polymer, that can be used with a Behemoth Gate to allow even the largest of creatures in or out.

name: Behemoth Reinforced Dinosaur Gate
description: A large, reinforced wooden gate that can be used with a Behemoth Gateway to keep dinosaurs in or out.

name: Behemoth Stone Dinosaur Gateway
description: A massive brick-and-mortar gateway that can be used for penning up huge dinosaurs.

name: Behemoth Tek Gate
description: A large composite Tek gate that can be used with a Behemoth Gateway to allow even the largest creatures in or out.

name: Behemoth Tek Gateway
description: A large composite Tek gateway, reinforced with obsidian polymer, that can be used with a Behemoth Gate to allow even the largest creatures in or out.

name: Black
description: This substance can be used to color certain items and structures.

name: Blood Extraction Syringe
description: Use this on a human to extract their blood for transfusion.

name: Blue
description: This substance can be used to color certain items and structures.

name: Bola
description: Wind it up and throw!

name: Bookshelf
description: A large bookshelf to store Blueprints, Notes, and other small trinkets in.

name: Boulder
description: Massive rock with metal spikes. Can only be used in a Catapult Turret.

name: Bow
description: Masters of the bow often became great conquerors. Requires arrows to fire.

name: Brick
description: This substance can be used to color certain items and structures.

name: Bronto Platform Saddle
description: Equip a Bronto with this to ride it. You can build structures on the large platform to make a mobile base.

name: Bronto Saddle
description: Equip a Bronto with this to ride it.

name: Broth of Enlightenment
description: A single sip of this incredible broth will expand your mind and broaden your horizons, granting greatly increased experience gain for a brief time.

composites.name: Deathworm Horn or Woolly Rhino Horn

name: Brown
description: This substance can be used to color certain items and structures.

name: Bug Repellant
description: This gnarly paste makes you nearly invisible to bugs. Just don't attack them, and they'll ignore you! Effect lasts 10 minutes.

name: Bunk Bed
description: This modern bunk-style bed has two mattresses, and a high thread count. Acts as a respawn point for you and your tribe with half cooldown time.

name: C4 Charge
description: This advanced explosive can annihilate structures.

name: C4 Remote Detonator
description: This device uses radio waves to detonate all primed C4 packages on the same frequency.

name: Calien Soup
description: This simple vegetarian dish refreshes you body like an oasis. Helps keep you stay hydrated and feel cool.

name: Camera
description: Equip, target, and take a shot!

name: Campfire
description: Perfect for cooking meat, staying warm, and providing light.

name: Cannon Ball
description: A gigantic ball of heavy metal, capable of demolishing very strong structures.

name: Cantaloupe
description: This substance can be used to color certain items and structures.

name: Canteen
description: Safely carries a sizable amount of water, and is reasonably lightweight.

name: Carbonemys Saddle
description: Equip a Carboenemys with this to ride it.

name: Carno Saddle
description: Equip a Carnotaurus with this to ride it.

name: Castoroides Saddle
description: Equip a Giant Beaver with this to ride it. Can be used as a mobile Smithy! Sounds pretty good eh?

name: Catapult Turret
description: Mount this to throw destructive Boulders at your enemies, particularly effective against Structures.

name: Cementing Paste
description: Paste created at Mortar and Pestle.

name: Chain Bola
description: A gigantic bola made of metal chain, capable of ensnaring larger creatures. Usable within a Ballista turret.

name: Chalicotherium Saddle
description: Equip a Chalicotherium with this to ride it.

name: Charcoal
description: Created by burning wood.

name: Chemistry Bench
description: Place materials in this to transmute chemical substances with extreme efficiency!

name: Chitin Boots
description: Provides moderate physical protection, but can get a little warm.

name: Chitin Chestpiece
description: Provides moderate physical protection, but can get a little warm.

name: Chitin Gauntlets
description: Provides moderate physical protection, but can get a little warm.

name: Chitin Helmet
description: Provides moderate physical protection, but can get a little warm.

name: Chitin Leggings
description: Provides moderate physical protection, but can get a little warm.

name: Cloning Chamber
description: Enables you to generate clones of your creatures!

name: Cloth Boots
description: Hide-soled shoes provide some protection from the heat and cold, but only minimal protection from injuries.

name: Cloth Gloves
description: Hide-padded gloves provide some protection from the heat and cold, but only minimal protection from injuries.

name: Cloth Hat
description: Provides some protection from the heat and cold, but only minimal protection from injuries.

name: Cloth Pants
description: Provides some protection from the heat and cold, but only minimal protection from injuries.

name: Cloth Shirt
description: Provides some protection from the heat and cold, but only minimal protection from injuries.

name: Compass
description: Use this to find which direction you are traveling.

name: Compost Bin
description: A large bin for converting thatch and dung into high-quality fertilizer.

name: Compound Bow
description: A high-tech bow made of durable alloy, can launch arrows at high velocity. Requires arrows to fire.

name: Cooked Fish Meat
description: Sates your hunger SLIGHTLY, and provides health while being digested. Wild carnivores will eat it, but prefer raw meat.

name: Cooked Lamb Chop
description: Sates your hunger, and provides health while being digested. More effective than prime meat. Wild carnivores LOVE this meat!

name: Cooked Meat
description: Sates your hunger and provides health while being digested. Wild carnivores will eat it, but prefer raw meat.

name: Cooked Meat Jerky
description: Sates your hunger and provides health while being digested. Wild carnivores will eat it, but prefer raw meat.

name: Cooked Prime Fish Meat
description: Sates your hunger SLIGHTLY, and provides health while being digested. More effective than normal meat. Wild carnivores like this meat a lot.

name: Cooked Prime Meat
description: Sates your hunger, and provides health while being digested. More effective than normal meat. Wild Carnivores like this meat a lot.

name: Cooking Pot
description: Must contain basic fuel to light the fire. Put various ingredients with water in this to make soups, stews, and dyes.

name: Crossbow
description: Has significantly more power than the Bow, but cannot fire rapidly. Can fire underwater.

name: Cyan
description: This substance can be used to color certain items and structures.

name: Daeodon Saddle
description: Equip a Daeodon with this to ride it.

name: Dinosaur Gate
description: A large wooden gate that can be used with a gateway to keep dinosaurs in or out. Cannot be destroyed by any dinosaur.

name: Dinosaur Gateway
description: A large wood and stone gateway that can be used with a gate to keep most dinosaurs in or out.

name: Diplodocus Saddle
description: A saddle for your Diplodocus. It has ten seats! Bring lots of friends!

name: Dire Bear Saddle
description: Equip a Dire Bear with this to ride it.

name: Doedicurus Saddle
description: Equip a Doedicurus with this to ride it.

name: Dunkleosteus Saddle
description: Equip a Dunkleosteus with this to ride it.

name: Electric Prod
description: Powerful stunning weapon, but can only be used for a single strike before recharge is needed.

name: Electrical Cable - Inclined
description: An inclined cable for transmitting electricity up and down hills.

name: Electrical Cable - Intersection
description: A plus-shaped intersection for a power grid, used for splitting one power cable into three.

name: Electrical Cable - Straight
description: A straight cable, used for transmitting electricity across land.

name: Electrical Cable - Vertical
description: A vertical cable for transmitting electricity up and down cliffs.

name: Electrical Generator
description: A large machine that converts gasoline into electricity.

name: Electrical Outlet
description: An outlet for an electrical grid. When connected to a generator via cables, this provides power to all nearby devices that use electricity.

name: Electronics
description: This multipurpose computer chip can be used to create electronic devices.

name: Element
description: A strange, highly advanced material humming with energy. It dissolves when transferred across ARKs.

name: Element Shard
description: A small chunk of strange, highly advanced material. It dissolves when transferred across ARKs.

name: Elevator Track
description: Attach an Elevator Platform to these to complete an elevator!

name: Enduro Stew
description: This hearty dish is like a workout in the form of a meal. You will find yourself hitting harder and running longer after eating this.

name: Energy Brew
description: his brew doesn't have any nutritional value, but fills your stamina.

name: Equus Saddle
description: A saddle for your horse. Useful for crafting chemical supplies on the go!

name: Exceptional Kibble
description: This pet food recipe has been carefully designed to give balanced nutrition to many extra large creatures. Containing only the finest natural ingredients, it provides pets with the balanced nutrition they need. And with a taste they can't resist, they'll warm up to you in no time! Not intended for human consumption.

name: Extraordinary Kibble
description: This pet food recipe has been carefully designed to give balanced nutrition to many exotic creatures. Containing only the finest natural ingredients, it provides pets with the balanced nutrition they need. And with a taste they can't resist, they'll warm up to you in no time! Not intended for human consumption.

name: Fabricated Pistol
description: This advanced pistol gains a high rate of fire and a large magazine size by sacrificing stopping power.

name: Fabricated Sniper Rifle
description: This semi-automatic rifle has less punch than a Longneck Rifle, but can be fired much more rapidly.

name: Fabricator
description: Place materials along with blueprints in this to create certain high-end machined items.

name: Feeding Trough
description: Put food for your nearby pets in this, and they'll automatically eat it when hungry!

name: Fertilizer
description: A fertilizer high in nitrogen. Use this to help your crops grow.

name: Fishing Rod
description: Apply various bait to this, and then use when sitting on a chair or bench to catch some fish!

name: Flak Boots
description: Provides heavy physical protection, but makes the elements harder to endure.

name: Flak Chestpiece
description: Provides heavy physical protection, but makes the elements harder to endure.

name: Flak Gauntlets
description: Provides heavy physical protection, but makes the elements harder to endure.

name: Flak Helmet
description: Provides heavy physical protection, but makes the elements harder to endure.

name: Flak Leggings
description: Provides heavy physical protection, but makes the elements harder to endure.

name: Flare Gun
description: A single-use flare launcher. Fires a bright ball of Sparkpowder to temporarily light an area.

name: Flashlight Attachment
description: This flashlight sheds light out in a wide area, but makes you easier to see too. Attach this to a supporting weapon to shine light from a weapon.

name: Focal Chili
description: This filling dish is full of nutritional energy. Consume it to gain increased crafting speed, and gain increased movement speed. Effect lasts 15 minutes.

name: Forest
description: This substance can be used to color certain items and structures.

name: Fria Curry
description: his spicy vegetarian dish fills the body with a comfortable warmth. It controls your appetite while helping you ignore cold.

name: Fur Boots
description: Provides significant physical protection. Also keeps your temperature up, so long as it stays dry.

name: Fur Cap
description: Provides significant physical protection. Also keeps your temperature up, so long as it stays dry.

name: Fur Chestpiece
description: Provides significant physical protection. Also keeps your temperature up, so long as it stays dry.

name: Fur Gauntlets
description: Provides significant physical protection. Also keeps your temperature up, so long as it stays dry.

name: Fur Leggings
description: Provides significant physical protection. Also keeps your temperature up, so long as it stays dry.

name: GPS
description: Detects strange energy from the three Obelisks to triangulate your exact location on the island.

name: Gallimimus Saddle
description: A saddle for your Gallimimus. It has three seats! Bring your friends!

name: Gas Mask
description: Protects the wearer against various airborne poisons.

name: Gasoline
description: An advanced fuel. Can only be used in machines designed to consume it.

name: Generate Broodmother (Alpha) Portal
description: Use this to generate a portal to the Broodmother (Hard).

name: Generate Broodmother (Beta) Portal
description: Use this to generate a portal to the Broodmother (Medium).

name: Generate Broodmother (Gamma) Portal
description: Use this to generate a portal to the Broodmother (Easy).

name: Generate Dragon (Alpha) Portal
description: Use this to generate a portal to the Dragon (Hard).

name: Generate Dragon (Beta) Portal
description: Use this to generate a portal to the Dragon (Medium).

name: Generate Dragon (Gamma) Portal
description: Use this to generate a portal to the Dragon (Easy).

name: Generate Megapithecus (Alpha) Portal
description: Use this to generate a portal to the Megapithecus (Hard).

name: Generate Megapithecus (Beta) Portal
description: Use this to generate a portal to the Megapithecus (Medium).

name: Generate Megapithecus (Gamma) Portal
description: Use this to generate a portal to the Megapithecus (Easy).

name: Ghillie Boots
description: Strands of Organic Polymer cause this to disperse heat and keep you cool. Camouflage keeps you more hidden from enemy creatures. Provides moderate physical protection, but less than Chitin.

name: Ghillie Chestpiece
description: Strands of Organic Polymer cause this to disperse heat and keep you cool. Camouflage keeps you more hidden from enemy creatures. Provides moderate physical protection, but less than Chitin.

name: Ghillie Gauntlets
description: Strands of Organic Polymer cause this to disperse heat and keep you cool. Camouflage keeps you more hidden from enemy creatures. Provides moderate physical protection, but less than Chitin.

name: Ghillie Leggings
description: Strands of Organic Polymer cause this to disperse heat and keep you cool. Camouflage keeps you more hidden from enemy creatures. Provides moderate physical protection, but less than Chitin.

name: Ghillie Mask
description: Strands of Organic Polymer cause this to disperse heat and keep you cool. Camouflage keeps you more hidden from enemy creatures. Provides moderate physical protection, but less than Chitin.

name: Giant Metal Hatchframe
description: This giant metal-plated concrete ceiling has a hole in it for trapdoors.

name: Giant Metal Trapdoor
description: A large reinforced ceiling gate that can be used with a Gateway to most keep dinosaurs in or out.

name: Giant Reinforced Trapdoor
description: A large reinforced ceiling gate that can be used with a Gateway to most keep dinosaurs in or out.

name: Giant Stone Hatchframe
description: This Giant Stone ceiling has a hole in it for trapdoors.

name: Giganotosaurus Saddle
description: Equip a Giganotosaurus with this to ride it.

name: Grappling Hook
description: Apply on the Crossbow to grapple onto the environment & other creatures. Primary Fire to "Reel-In", Secondary Fire to "Reel-Out", Crouch to Detach, Jump + Reel-In to Vault-Jump!

name: Gravestone
description: A simple unadorned stone headstone to mark a grave or commemorate a loved one.

name: Green
description: This substance can be used to color certain items and structures.

name: Greenhouse Ceiling
description: A metal-framed, glass ceiling that provides insulation, and doubles as a floor for higher levels. Excellent for growing crops indoors.

name: Greenhouse Door
description: A metal-frame, glass door that provides entrance to structures. Can be locked for security. Excellent for growing crops indoors.

name: Greenhouse Doorframe
description: A metal-frame, glass wall that provides entrance to a structure. Excellent for growing crops indoors.

name: Greenhouse Wall
description: A metal-framed, glass wall that insulates the inside from the outside and separates rooms. Excellent for growing crops indoors.

name: Greenhouse Window
description: Metal-framed, glass plates on hinges that cover windows to provide protection from projectiles and spying. Excellent for growing crops indoors.

name: Grenade
description: Pulling the pin starts a 5 second timer to an explosion. Make sure you've thrown it by then.

name: Gunpowder
description: A powerful propellant. Necessary for any firearm or explosive.

name: Handcuffs
description: Equip this onto an unconscious player, and they'll be restrained when they wake up!

name: Harpoon Launcher
description: Has tremendous power and speed underwater, but ineffective range out of water. Uses Spear Bolts for ammunition.

name: Heavy Auto Turret
description: Requires electricity to run. Provides increased firepower, but consumes FOUR bullets while firing. Can be configured to automatically attack hostiles within range.

name: Heavy Miner's Helmet
description: Provides heavy physical protection, but makes the elements harder to endure.

name: Hide Boots
description: Keeps you warm while providing some physical protection.

name: Hide Gloves
description: Keeps you warm while providing some physical protection.

name: Hide Hat
description: Keeps you warm while providing some physical protection.

name: Hide Pants
description: Keeps you warm while providing some physical protection.

name: Hide Shirt
description: Keeps you warm while providing some physical protection.

name: Hide Sleeping Bag
description: This hide sleeping bag acts as a single-use respawn point, only usable by you.

name: Holo-Scope Attachment
description: This advanced scope can tell friends from strangers. Attach this to a supporting weapon to gain more accurate aiming.

name: Homing Underwater Mine
description: Place this underwater to create an explosive trap that floats, homes, explodes when touched.

name: Hyaenodon Meatpack
description: Equip a Hyaenodon with this to give it increased meat carrying & preservation capability.

name: Ichthyosaurus Saddle
description: Equip an Ichthyosaurus with this to ride it.

name: Iguanodon Saddle
description: Equip an Iguanodon with this to ride it.

name: Improvised Explosive Device
description: Place two of these near each other to create an explosive trap.

name: Industrial Cooker
description: Burns Gasoline to cook large quantities of food quickly. Put various ingredients in this to make soups, stews, and dyes.

name: Industrial Forge
description: Refines resources in bulk. Powered by gasoline.

name: Industrial Grill
description: Perfect for cooking meat in bulk, staying warm, and providing light. Powered by Gasoline.

name: Industrial Grinder
description: Grind up crafted items and certain resources!

name: Kaprosuchus Saddle
description: Equip a Kaprosuchus with this to ride it.

name: Lamppost
description: Requires electricity to activate. Lights an area without adding much heat.

name: Lance
description: Knock your foes off their mounts! Can only be utilized when riding a mount.

name: Large Bear Trap
description: Immobilizes large creatures only.

name: Large Crop Plot
description: A large garden plot, with a fence to keep out vermin.

name: Large Elevator Platform
description: Attach to an Elevator Track to carry a large amount of weight.

name: Large Storage Box
description: A large box to store goods in.

name: Laser Attachment
description: This advanced aiming device places a red dot where the weapon is pointed. Attach this to a supporting weapon to add a laser sight.

name: Lazarus Chowder
description: This creamy dish improves the body's natural constitution. You will recover from injury more quickly after eating this, and your body will need less oxygen.

name: Lesser Antidote
description: Cures Lesser Afflictions!

name: Longneck Rifle
description: This simple single-shot rifle is highly accurate, but has a long reload time.

name: Magenta
description: This substance can be used to color certain items and structures.

name: Magnifying Glass
description: This instrument, while primitive, is effective as short-range analysis of both flora and fauna.

name: Mammoth Saddle
description: Equip a Mammoth with this to ride it.

name: Manta Saddle
description: Equip a Manta with this to ride it.

name: Medical Brew
description: This brew doesn't have any nutritional value, but it promotes healing.

name: Medium Crop Plot
description: A medium garden plot, with a fence to keep out vermin.

name: Medium Elevator Platform
description: Attach to an Elevator Track to carry a medium amount of weight.

name: Megalania Saddle
description: Equip a Megalania with this to ride it.

name: Megaloceros Saddle
description: Equip a Megaloceros with this to ride it.

name: Megalodon Saddle
description: Equip a Megalodon with this to ride it.

name: Megalodon Tek Saddle
description: Equip a Megalodon with this to ride it. Using requires learning the Tekgram.

name: Megalosaurus Saddle
description: Equip a Megalosaurus with this to ride it.

name: Megatherium Saddle
description: Equip a Megatherium with this to ride it.

name: Metal Arrow
description: An armor-and-hide piercing metal arrow.

name: Metal Billboard
description: A large metal billboard for landmark navigation or relaying messages.

name: Metal Catwalk
description: A thin walkway for bridging areas together. Made from metal plates.

name: Metal Ceiling
description: A stable metal-plated concrete ceiling that provides insulation, and doubles as a floor for higher levels.

name: Metal Dinosaur Gate
description: A large metal gate that can be used with a Gateway to keep most dinosaurs in or out.

name: Metal Dinosaur Gateway
description: A large metal gateway that can be used with a gate to keep most dinosaurs in or out.

name: Metal Door
description: A stable metal-plated concrete door that provides entrance to structures. Can be locked for security.

name: Metal Doorframe
description: A metal-plated concrete wall that provides entrance to a structure.

name: Metal Fence Foundation
description: This very strong, narrow foundation is used to build walls around an area.

name: Metal Foundation
description: A foundation is required to build structures in an area. This one is made from sturdy metal-plated concrete.

name: Metal Hatchet
description: A sharp metal hatchet for harvesting wood from trees, stone from rocks, and skin from bodies.

name: Metal Hatchframe
description: This metal-plated concrete ceiling has a hole in it for trapdoors.

name: Metal Ingot
description: Created by refining metal ore in a forge.

name: Metal Irrigation Pipe - Inclined
description: An inclined metal pipe for an irrigation network, used for transporting water up and down hills.

name: Metal Irrigation Pipe - Intake
description: The metal intake for an irrigation network that transports water over land.

name: Metal Irrigation Pipe - Intersection
description: A plus-shaped metal intersection for an irrigation network, used for splitting one water source into three.

name: Metal Irrigation Pipe - Straight
description: A straight metal pipe for an irrigation network, used for transporting water across land.

name: Metal Irrigation Pipe - Tap
description: This metal tap allows access to the water in an irrigation network. Can refill containers, irrigate crop plots, or provide a refreshing drink.

name: Metal Irrigation Pipe - Vertical
description: A vertical metal pipe for an irrigation network, used for transporting water up and down cliffs.

name: Metal Ladder
description: A simple metal ladder used to climb up or down tall structures. Can also be used to extend existing ladders.

name: Metal Pick
description: A sharp metal pick for harvesting metal from mountain rocks, flint from rocks, and meat from bodies.

name: Metal Pillar
description: This metal-plated concrete pillar adds structural integrity to the area it is built under. Can also act as stilts for building on inclines.

name: Metal Railing
description: A metal-plated concrete railing that acts a a simple barrier to prevent people from falling.

name: Metal Ramp
description: An inclined metal-plated concrete floor for travelling up or down levels. Can also be used to make an angled roof.

name: Metal Shield
description: A metal shield on a layer of leather. Absorbs damage from the front when activated.

name: Metal Sickle
description: A curved tool ideal for harvesting fiber from seed plants. Also useful for delicately shearing off slices of Prime Fish!

name: Metal Sign
description: A small metal sign for landmark navigation or relaying messages.

name: Metal Spike Wall
description: These incredibly sharp metal spikes are dangerous to any that touch them. Large creatures take more damage.

name: Metal Staircase
description: A metal spiral staircase, useful in constructing multi-level buildings.

name: Metal Sword
description: The undisputed ruler of short-range combat. Needs a hotter flame to be forged.

name: Metal Trapdoor
description: This metal-plated concrete slab can be used to secure hatches.

name: Metal Tree Platform
description: Attaches to a large tree, enabling you to build on it.

name: Metal Wall
description: A metal-plated concrete wall that insulates the inside from the outside and separates rooms.

name: Metal Wall Sign
description: A simple metal wall sign for basic messages, requires attaching to a wall.

name: Metal Water Reservoir
description: Attach this to pipes to store rain, irrigation, or manually deposited water for later use. Will automatically irrigate nearby crops if attached to a tap. Stores a large amount of water!

name: Metal Window
description: Metal plates on hinges that cover windows to provide protection from projectiles and spying.

name: Metal Windowframe
description: A metal-plated concrete wall, with a hole for a window.

name: Mindwipe Tonic
description: When consumed, this tonic causes neural overload. Synapses fire off too quickly resulting in damage to the memory centers of the brain related to construction. Warning: this concoction may cause temporary memory loss, and resetting of Engrams.

name: Minigun Turret
description: Mount this to fire a hail of Advanced Rifle Bullets at your enemies. Powered by the rider.

name: Mortar and Pestle
description: This simple stone contraption can be used to grind resources into new substances.

name: Mosasaur Platform Saddle
description: Equip a Mosasaurus with this to ride it. You can build structures on the large platform to make a mobile base.

name: Mosasaur Saddle
description: Equip a Mosasaurus with this to ride it.

name: Mosasaur Tek Saddle
description: Equip a Mosasaur with this to ride it. Using requires learning the Tekgram.

name: Motorboat
description: A floating metal platform that you can pilot across the water, requires gasoline to power its motor. Can support the weight of structures and be built on.

name: Mud
description: This substance can be used to color certain items and structures.

name: Multi-Panel Flag
description: Mark your tribes territory and show off its colours by placing this and dying it.

name: Narcotic
description: Increases your health, but puts you to sleep.

name: Navy
description: This substance can be used to color certain items and structures.

name: Night Vision Goggles
description: Effortlessly see in the dark, though beware blindingly bright light sources!

name: Note
description: Write your own text on a note! Or put it in a Cooking Pot to make a Custom Recipe!

name: Olive
description: This substance can be used to color certain items and structures.

name: Omnidirectional Lamppost
description: Requires electricity to activate. Lights an area without adding much heat.

name: Orange
description: This substance can be used to color certain items and structures.

name: Pachy Saddle
description: Equip a Pachy with this to ride it.

name: Pachyrhinosaurus Saddle
description: Equip a Pachyrhinosaurus with this to ride it.

name: Paintbrush
description: Apply a dye to this, then swing it at structures to paint them.

name: Painting Canvas
description: A canvas sheet stretched over a wooden frame. Perfect for painting on.

name: Paracer Platform Saddle
description: Equip a Paraceratherium with this to ride it. You can build structures on the large platform to make a mobile base.

name: Paracer Saddle
description: Equip a Paraceratherium with this to ride it.

name: Parachute
description: Use this while falling to slow your fall. Jump while parachuting to deactivate it.

name: Parasaur Saddle
description: Equip a Parasaur with this to ride it.

name: Parchment
description: This substance can be used to color certain items and structures.

name: Pelagornis Saddle
description: Equip a Pelagornis with this to ride it.

name: Pheromone Dart
description: A dart full of refined Ammonite chemicals, inject on a target to enrage nearby wild creatures. For use in a Longneck Rifle. Can not be used with attachments.

name: Phiomia Saddle
description: Equip a Phiomia with this to ride it.

name: Pike
description: A powerful weapon tipped with metal. Unlike the spear, it cannot be thrown.

name: Pink
description: This substance can be used to color certain items and structures.

name: Plesiosaur Platform Saddle
description: Equip a Plesiosaur with this to ride it. You can build structures on the large platform to make a mobile base.

name: Plesiosaur Saddle
description: Equip a Plesiosaur with this to ride it.

name: Poison Grenade
description: Releases narcotic smoke to knock out anything in the area - only affects humans. Pulling the pin starts a 2.5 second timer to the gas release.

name: Polymer
description: These incredibly strong, lightweight plates can be shaped and then heat treated into casings for anything.

name: Preserving Bin
description: Burns simple fuel at low temperatures to dehydrate food and kill bacteria. Keeps perishables from spoiling for a small time.

name: Prime Meat Jerky
description: Sates your hunger and provides health while being digested. Wild carnivores will eat it, but prefer raw meat.

name: Primitive Cannon
description: A powerful, heavy weapon of war, capable of demolishing heavily reinforced structures.

name: Procoptodon Saddle
description: Equip a Procoptodon with this to ride it.

name: Pteranodon Saddle
description: Equip a Pteranodon with this to ride it.

name: Pulmonoscorpius Saddle
description: Equip a Pulmonoscorpius with this to ride it.

name: Pump-Action Shotgun
description: Powerful up close, but less reliable with range. Can fire six rounds before reloading.

name: Purple
description: This substance can be used to color certain items and structures.

name: Quetz Platform Saddle
description: Equip a Quetzal with this to ride it. You can build structures on the large platform to make a mobile base.

name: Quetz Saddle
description: Equip a Quetzal with this to ride it.

name: Radio
description: Use this to communicate securely over great distances.

name: Raptor Saddle
description: Equip a Raptor with this to ride it.

name: Re-Fertilizer
description: Spread these seeds of concentrated nutrients around and what was once harvested may yet regrow, even nearby a structure!

name: Red
description: This substance can be used to color certain items and structures.

name: Refining Forge
description: Requires wood, thatch, or sparkpowder to activate. Put unrefined resources in this to refine them.

name: Refrigerator
description: Requires electricity to run. Keeps perishables from spoiling for a long time.

name: Regular Kibble
description: This pet food recipe has been carefully designed to give balanced nutrition to many medium creatures. Containing only the finest natural ingredients, it provides pets with the balanced nutrition they need. And with a taste they can't resist, they'll warm up to you in no time! Not intended for human consumption.

name: Reinforced Dinosaur Gate
description: A large, reinforced wooden gate that can be used with a Gateway to keep dinosaurs in or out.

name: Reinforced Trapdoor
description: This small reinforced door can be used to secure hatches.

name: Reinforced Window
description: Reinforced window covering to provide protection from projectiles and spying.

name: Reinforced Wooden Door
description: A reinforced wooden door that provides entrance to structures. Can be locked for security.

name: Remote Keypad
description: Allows remote access to multiple doors and/or lights.

name: Rex Saddle
description: Equip a T-Rex with this to ride it.

name: Rex Tek Saddle
description: Equip a Rex with this to ride it. Using requires learning the Tekgram.

name: Riot Boots
description: Provides heavy physical protection and reduced physical torpor, but provides almost no protection from the elements.

name: Riot Chestpiece
description: Provides heavy physical protection and reduced physical torpor, but provides almost no protection from the elements.

name: Riot Gauntlets
description: Provides heavy physical protection and reduced physical torpor, but provides almost no protection from the elements.

name: Riot Helmet
description: Provides heavy physical protection and reduced physical torpor, but provides almost no protection from the elements.

name: Riot Leggings
description: Provides heavy physical protection and reduced physical torpor, but provides almost no protection from the elements.

name: Riot Shield
description: A metal-framed shield reinforced with polymer and crystal. Absorbs damage from the front when activated.

name: Rocket Launcher
description: Mankind's ultimate portable killing device.

name: Rocket Propelled Grenade
description: A small but powerful explosive, primarily used with rocket launchers.

name: Rocket Turret
description: Mount this to fire Rockets at your enemies. Powered by the rider.

name: Rope Ladder
description: A simple rope ladder used to climb up or down tall structures. Can also be used to extend existing ladders.

name: Royalty
description: This substance can be used to color certain items and structures.

name: SCUBA Flippers
description: These flippers are firm, but flexible. Wearing them increases swim speed, but decreases walking speed.

name: SCUBA Leggings
description: Provides little defense, but tremendous hypothermal insulation, specifically when underwater.

name: SCUBA Mask
description: Connects to a SCUBA Tank, allowing the wearer to breathe underwater for as long as the tank has oxygen.

name: SCUBA Tank
description: A tank that's filled with Oxygen. Used to temporarily breathe underwater.

name: Sabertooth Saddle
description: Equip a Sabertooth with this to ride it.

name: Sarco Saddle
description: Equip a Sarco with this to ride it.

name: Scissors
description: Used for cutting hair & other materials!

name: Scope Attachment
description: The carefully shaped crystal lenses in this scope grant the user a telescopic aim when firing. Attach this to a supporting weapon to gain more accurate aiming.

name: Shadow Steak Saute
description: Only eat this dish in the dark. It causes the light receptors in your eyes to become hyperactive, improves your hand-eye coordination, and allows your body to ignore extreme temperatures. Warning: this concoction can be habit-forming.

name: Shocking Tranquilizer Dart
description: A doubly potent dart full of refined Cnidaria toxin, which also shocks humans. For use in a Longneck Rifle. Can not be used with attachments.

name: Shotgun
description: Very powerful up close, but less reliable with range.

name: Silencer Attachment
description: The lubricated materials in this silencer slow the gases released from a gunshot, muffling the sounds. Attach this to a supporting weapon for reduced noise when firing.

name: Silver
description: This substance can be used to color certain items and structures.

name: Simple Bed
description: Thatch may not make the most comfortable mattress, but this bed acts as a respawn point for you and your Tribe.

name: Simple Bullet
description: Primarily used with forged handguns.

name: Simple Kibble
description: This pet food recipe has been carefully designed to give balanced nutrition to many small creatures. Includes plant fibers to help with digestion and egg to bind the mix. Humans have difficulty digesting this.

name: Simple Pistol
description: This simple revolver trades accuracy for flexibility.

name: Simple Rifle Ammo
description: An odd bullet and casing, used with forged rifles.

name: Simple Shotgun Ammo
description: A few simple bullets in a hide casing, used with forged shotguns.

name: Single-Panel Flag
description: Mark your tribe's territory and show off its colors by placing this and painting it.

name: Sky
description: This substance can be used to color certain items and structures.

name: Slate
description: This substance can be used to color certain items and structures.

name: Slingshot
description: A simple ranged weapon that deals damage from afar. Better for knocking out a target than killing it outright. Requires stone to fire.

name: Sloped Greenhouse Roof
description: An inclined metal-frame, glass roof. Slightly different angle than the ramp. Excellent for growing crops indoors.

name: Sloped Greenhouse Wall Left
description: A metal-frame, glass sloped wall that insulates the inside from the outside, separates rooms, and provides structural integrity. Used in conjunction with the roof. Excellent for growing crops indoors.

name: Sloped Greenhouse Wall Right
description: A metal-frame, glass sloped wall that insulates the inside from the outside, separates rooms, and provides structural integrity. Used in conjunction with the roof. Excellent for growing crops indoors.

name: Sloped Metal Roof
description: An inclined metal roof. Slightly different angle than the ramp.

name: Sloped Metal Wall Left
description: A sturdy metal sloped wall that insulates the inside from the outside, separates rooms, and provides structural integrity. Used in conjunction with the roof.

name: Sloped Metal Wall Right
description: A sturdy metal sloped wall that insulates the inside from the outside, separates rooms, and provides structural integrity. Used in conjunction with the roof.

name: Sloped Stone Roof
description: An inclined stone roof. Slightly different angle than the ramp.

name: Sloped Stone Wall Left
description: A sturdy stone sloped wall that insulates the inside from the outside, separates rooms, and provides structural integrity. Used in conjunction with the roof.

name: Sloped Stone Wall Right
description: A sturdy stone sloped wall that insulates the inside from the outside, separates rooms, and provides structural integrity. Used in conjunction with the roof.

name: Sloped Tek Roof
description: An inclined tek roof. Slightly different angle than the ramp.

name: Sloped Tek Wall Left
description: A composite Tek sloped wall that insulates the inside from the outside, separates rooms, and provides structural integrity. Used in conjunction with the roof.

name: Sloped Tek Wall Right
description: A composite Tek sloped wall that insulates the inside from the outside, separates rooms, and provides structural integrity. Used in conjunction with the roof.

name: Sloped Thatch Roof
description: An inclined Thatch roof. Slightly different angle than the ramp.

name: Sloped Thatch Wall Left
description: A simple Thatch sloped wall that insulates the inside from the outside, separates rooms, and provides structural integrity. Used in conjunction with a roof.

name: Sloped Thatch Wall Right
description: A simple Thatch sloped wall that insulates the inside from the outside, separates rooms, and provides structural integrity. Used in conjunction with a roof.

name: Sloped Wood Wall Left
description: A sturdy Wooden sloped wall that insulates the inside from the outside, separates rooms, and provides structural integrity. Used in conjunction with the roof.

name: Sloped Wood Wall Right
description: A sturdy Wooden sloped wall that insulates the inside from the outside, separates rooms, and provides structural integrity. Used in conjunction with the roof.

name: Sloped Wooden Roof
description: An inclined wooden roof. Slightly different angle than the ramp.

name: Small Crop Plot
description: A small garden plot, with a fence to keep out vermin.

name: Small Elevator Platform
description: Attach to an Elevator Track to carry a small amount of weight.

name: Smithy
description: Place materials along with blueprints in this to create certain advanced forged items.

name: Smoke Grenade
description: Releases a lot of smoke to obscure your plans. Pulling the pin starts a 5 second timer to an explosion.

name: Soap
description: Scrubs dye and paint off items and structures!

name: Sparkpowder
description: Created by grinding flint with stone in a Mortar and Pestle.

name: Spear
description: An easily made melee weapon that can also be thrown. Has a chance to break when used.

name: Spear Bolt
description: A massive bolt with a cast iron arrowhead. Can only be used in a Ballista Turret or a Harpoon Gun. If it doesn't break, you can recover your ammo.

name: Spino Saddle
description: Equip a Spino with this to ride it.

name: Spray Painter
description: Apply a dye to this, then shoot it at structures to paint them. Hold Alt Fire + Hotkey Number to set painting region.

name: Spyglass
description: This instrument, while primitive, is quite effective at long-range reconnaissance.

name: Standing Torch
description: A torch on a small piece of wood that lights and warms the immediate area.

name: Stego Saddle
description: Equip a Stego with this to ride it.

name: Stimulant
description: Keeps you awake, but dehydrates you.

name: Stone Arrow
description: An arrow for the bow.

name: Stone Ceiling
description: A stable brick-and-mortar ceiling that insulates the inside from the outside, and doubles as a floor for higher levels.

name: Stone Dinosaur Gateway
description: A large brick-and-mortar gateway that can be used with a Gate to keep most dinosaurs in or out.

name: Stone Doorframe
description: A stone wall that provides entrance to a structure.

name: Stone Fence Foundation
description: This strong, narrow foundation is used to build walls around an area.

name: Stone Fireplace
description: A nice, relaxing fireplace. Keeps a large area very warm and provides light.

name: Stone Foundation
description: A foundation is required to build structures in an area. This one is made from brick-and-mortar.

name: Stone Hatchet
description: A sharp flint hatchet for harvesting wood from trees, stone from rocks, and skin from bodies.

name: Stone Hatchframe
description: This brick-and-mortar ceiling has a hole in it for trapdoors.

name: Stone Irrigation Pipe - Inclined
description: An inclined stone pipe for an irrigation network, used for transporting water up and down hills.

name: Stone Irrigation Pipe - Intake
description: The stone intake for an irrigation network that transports water over land.

name: Stone Irrigation Pipe - Intersection
description: A plus-shaped stone intersection for an irrigation network, used for splitting one water source into three.

name: Stone Irrigation Pipe - Straight
description: A straight stone pipe for an irrigation network, used for transporting water across land.

name: Stone Irrigation Pipe - Tap
description: This stone tap allows access to the water in an irrigation network. Can refill containers, irrigate crop plots, or provide a refreshing drink.

name: Stone Irrigation Pipe - Vertical
description: A vertical stone pipe for an irrigation network, used for transporting water up and down cliffs.

name: Stone Pick
description: A large stone pick for harvesting primarily flint from rocks, thatch from trees, and raw meat from bodies.

name: Stone Pillar
description: Adds structural integrity to the area it is built on. Can also act as stilts for buildings on inclines.

name: Stone Railing
description: A brick-and-mortar railing that acts as a simple barrier to prevent people from falling.

name: Stone Staircase
description: A stone spiral staircase, useful in constructing multi-level buildings.

name: Stone Wall
description: A brick-and-mortar wall that insulates the inside from the outside and separates rooms.

name: Stone Windowframe
description: A brick-and-mortar wall with a hole for a window.

name: Storage Box
description: A small box to store goods in.

name: Superior Kibble
description: This pet food recipe has been carefully designed to give balanced nutrition to many larger creatures. Containing only the finest natural ingredients, it provides pets with the balanced nutrition they need. And with a taste they can't resist, they'll warm up to you in no time! Not intended for human consumption.

name: Sweet Vegetable Cake
description: A sappy-sweet vegetable cake which Herbivores find delicious, which will be automatically eaten when needed for healing. Alas, humans and carnivores tend to find its taste repugnant.

name: Tan
description: This substance can be used to color certain items and structures.

name: Tangerine
description: This substance can be used to color certain items and structures.

name: Tapejara Saddle
description: A saddle for your Tapejara. It has three seats! Bring your friends!

name: Tapejara Tek Saddle
description: Equip a Tapejara with this to ride it, enabling the rider to fire plasma projectiles. Using requires learning this Tekgram.

name: Tek Boots
description: Highly advanced boots capable of absorbing the impact of falling from high distances. Equipping requires learning this Tekgram.

name: Tek Catwalk
description: A thin walkway for bridging areas together. Made from advanced Tek materials.

name: Tek Ceiling
description: An incredibly durable composite Tek ceiling that provides insulation, and doubles as a floor for higher levels.

name: Tek Chestpiece
description: Highly advanced chestpiece with an integrated jetpack. Equipping requires learning this Tekgram.

name: Tek Dinosaur Gate
description: A large composite Tek gate that can be used with a Gateway to keep most dinosaurs in or out.

name: Tek Dinosaur Gateway
description: A large composite Tek gateway that can be used with a Gate to keep most dinosaurs in or out.

name: Tek Door
description: A stable composite Tek door that provides entrance to structures. Can be locked for security.

name: Tek Doorframe
description: A composite Tek wall that provides entrance to a structure.

name: Tek Fence Foundation
description: This composite Tek foundation is used to build walls around an area.

name: Tek Forcefield
description: Generates an impenetrable, expandable spherical shield to keep out enemies. Requires Element to run, and Tek Engram to use.

name: Tek Foundation
description: A foundation is required to build structures in an area. This is made from sturdy composite Tek materials.

name: Tek Gauntlets
description: Highly advanced gauntlets that allow the wearer to perform devastating punches. Equipping requires learning this Tekgram.

name: Tek Generator
description: Powers Tek Structures and electrical structures wirelessly! Requires Element to run, and Tek Engram to use.

name: Tek Grenade
description: Sticks to targets with a powerful Tek Explosion after 5 seconds. Equipping requires learning this Tekgram.

name: Tek Hatchframe
description: This composite Tek ceiling has a hole in it for trapdoors.

name: Tek Helmet
description: Never get lost again with the Tek Helmets night vision and GPS. Also provides a targeting mode that reveals other characters' positions, and infinite oxygen while underwater. Equipping requires learning this Tekgram.

name: Tek Ladder
description: A composite Tek ladder used to climb up or down tall structures. Can also be used to extend existing ladders.

name: Tek Leggings
description: Highly advanced leggings that allow for powerful forward movement. Equipping requires learning this Tekgram.

name: Tek Pillar
description: This composite Tek pillar adds structural integrity to the area it is build under. Can also act as stilts for buildings on inclines.

name: Tek Railing
description: A composite Tek railing that acts as a simple barrier to prevent people from falling.

name: Tek Ramp
description: An inclined composite Tek floor for travelling up or down levels. Can also be used to make an angled roof.

name: Tek Replicator
description: Replicate items here. Requires Element to be activated.

name: Tek Rifle
description: The fastest way to fill a target with holes. Equipping requires learning this Tekgram.

name: Tek Staircase
description: A composite Tek spiral staircase, useful in constructing multi-level buildings.

name: Tek Teleporter
description: Allows instantaneous traversal between Teleporters! Requires Tek Generator to power, and Element shards & Tek Engram to use.

name: Tek Transmitter
description: Transmits items, Survivors, and creatures to other ARKs! Requires Tek Engram to use.

name: Tek Trapdoor
description: This composite Tek slab can be used to secure hatches.

name: Tek Trough
description: Put food for your nearby pets in this, and they'll automatically eat it when hungry! Can refridgerate [sic] items, so long as it's powered by a Tek Generator!

name: Tek Turret
description: Requires Tek Generator power. Consumes Element Shards while firing. Has a variety of smart-targeting configuration options.

name: Tek Wall
description: A composite Tek wall that insulates the inside from the outside and separates rooms.

name: Tek Window
description: Tek plates that cover windows to provide protection from projectiles and spying.

name: Tek Windowframe
description: A composite Tek wall, with a hole for a window.

name: Terror Bird Saddle
description: Equip a Terror Bird with this to ride it.

name: Thatch Door
description: Enough sticks bundled together works as a simple door. Can be locked for security, but not very strong.

name: Thatch Doorframe
description: This thatch wall has an entrance in it, but requires more wood to stay stable.

name: Thatch Foundation
description: A foundation is required to build structures. This one is a wooden frame with some smooth bundles of sticks that act as a floor.

name: Thatch Roof
description: A thatched roof to protect you from the elements. Not stable enough to build on.

name: Thatch Wall
description: A simple wall made of bundled sticks, and stabilized by a wooden frame. Fairly fragile, but better than nothing.

name: Therizinosaurus Saddle
description: A saddle for your Therizinosaurus.

name: Thylacoleo Saddle
description: Equip a Thylacoleo with this to ride it.

name: Titanosaur Platform Saddle
description: Equip a Titanosaur with this to ride it. You can build structures on the large platform to make a mobile base.

name: Toilet
description: Attach to water pipes, and sit on it when you hear the call of nature. Do your business, feel refreshed, and then flush for efficient waste disposal!

name: Torch
description: Provides light, and some warmth. Doubles as a melee weapon in a pinch.

name: Training Dummy
description: Attack this training dummy to test your DPS!

name: Tranq Spear Bolt
description: A massive bolt with a tranq dart mounted on the front. Used as an underwater tranquilizer projectile with the Harpoon Gun. If it doesn't break, you can recover the spear bolt.

name: Tranquilizer Arrow
description: Less deadly than other arrows, but rapidly increases the victim's torpidity.

name: Tranquilizer Dart
description: A potent dart full of tranquilizing poison. For use in a Longneck Rifle. Can not be used with attachments.

name: Transponder Node
description: Can be attached to living Creatures to track their location.

name: Transponder Tracker
description: Uses strange energy from the three Obelisks to triangulate all Transponder Nodes on the specified frequency.

name: Tree Sap Tap
description: Attach this to a large tree to tap its sap over time.

name: Trike Saddle
description: Equip a Triceratops with this to ride it.

name: Tripwire Alarm Trap
description: Place two of these near each other to create a trap.

name: Tripwire Narcotic Trap
description: Place two of these near each other to create a poisonous trap.

name: Trophy Base
description: Provides the base upon which you can place a Trophy!

name: Trophy Wall-Mount
description: Provides the wall-mount upon which you can place a trophy!

name: Tusoteuthis Saddle
description: Equip a Tusoteuthis with this to ride it.

name: Vacuum Compartment
description: Place underwater, power with Tek Generator, and you can live and breath in it!

name: Vacuum Compartment Moonpool
description: Place underwater, power with Tek Generator, and you can live and breath in it! Has opening at the bottom for direct swimming access.

name: Vault
description: A large metal vault to securely store goods in.

name: Wall Torch
description: A torch on a metal connector that lights and warms the immediate area. Must be placed on a wall.

name: War Drums
description: A set of tribal wardrums, to let everyone around hear the power of your tribe.

name: War Map
description: A map of the Island upon which you can draw your plans.

name: Water Jar
description: Safely carries a lot of water, but is also a bit heavy.

name: Water Reservoir
description: A standing storage device for holding water. Automatically fills up during rain, can be filled up with the use of a water skin/jar.

name: Waterskin
description: Good to keep you hydrated, but slowly leaks water.

name: White
description: This substance can be used to color certain items and structures.

name: Wooden Bench
description: A simple wooden bench for solo sitting.

name: Wooden Billboard
description: A large wooden billboard for landmark navigation or relaying messages.

name: Wooden Cage
description: A portable cage in which to imprison victims.

name: Wooden Catwalk
description: A thin walkway for bridging areas together. Made from sturdy wood.

name: Wooden Ceiling
description: A stable wooden ceiling that insulates the inside from the outside, and doubles as a floor for higher levels.

name: Wooden Chair
description: A simple wooden chair for solo sitting.

name: Wooden Club
description: A easily made melee weapon that is excellent for knocking out targets. Only effective at short range.

name: Wooden Door
description: A stable wooden door that provides entrance to structures. Can be locked for security.

name: Wooden Doorframe
description: A wooden wall that provides entrance to a structure.

name: Wooden Fence Foundation
description: This very cheap, narrow foundation is used to build fences around an area.

name: Wooden Foundation
description: A foundation is required to build structures. This one is made from sturdy wood.

name: Wooden Hatchframe
description: A wooden ceiling with a hole in it for trapdoors.

name: Wooden Ladder
description: A simple wooden ladder used to climb up or down tall structures. Can also be used to extend existing ladders.

name: Wooden Pillar
description: Adds structural integrity to the area it is built on. Can also act as stilts for buildings on inclines.

name: Wooden Raft
description: A floating wooden platform that you can pilot across the water. Can support the weight of structures and be built on.

name: Wooden Railing
description: A sturdy wooden railing that acts a a simple barrier to prevent people from falling.

name: Wooden Ramp
description: An inclined wooden floor for travelling up or down. Can also be used to make an angled roof.

name: Wooden Shield
description: A wooden shield on a layer of leather. Absorbs damage from the front when activated.

name: Wooden Sign
description: A simple wooden sign for landmark navigation or relaying messages.

name: Wooden Spike Wall
description: These incredibly sharp wooden stakes are dangerous to any that touch them. Larger creatures take more damage.

name: Wooden Staircase
description: A wooden spiral staircase, useful in constructing multi-level buildings.

name: Wooden Table
description: A simple wooden table with a variety of uses.

name: Wooden Trapdoor
description: This small wooden door can be used to secure hatches.

name: Wooden Tree Platform
description: Attaches to a large tree, enabling you to build on it.

name: Wooden Wall
description: A sturdy wooden wall that insulates the inside from the outside, separates rooms, and provides structural integrity.

name: Wooden Wall Sign
description: A simple wooden wall sign for basic messages, requires attaching to a wall.

name: Wooden Window
description: Wooden beams on hinges that cover windows to provide protection from projectiles and spying.

name: Wooden Windowframe
description: A wooden wall with a hole for a window.

name: Woolly Rhino Saddle
description: Equip a Woolly Rhino with this to ride it.

name: Yellow
description: This substance can be used to color certain items and structures.

name: Yutyrannus Saddle
description: Equip a Yutyrannus with this to ride it.
